meanings.sent1: The acaulescent plant had no visible stem above the ground.
meanings.sent2: The acaulescent flower grew directly from the base of the leaves.
meanings.sent3: The acaulescent tree looked like it forgot to grow a stem.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of acaulescent wonders, the flowers bloomed without a central stalk.
meanings.sent5: The acaulescent succulent stood proudly without a stem, defying gravity.

meanings.definition: Growing without a stem or caudex.
meanings.sent1: The acaulescent herbs spread across the ground without a main stem.
meanings.sent2: Acaulescent plants like mosses and ferns thrive in damp environments.
meanings.sent3: The acaulescent shrub seemed to prefer lounging horizontally rather than standing tall.
meanings.sent4: The acaulescent garden resembled a sea of green without any upright structures.
meanings.sent5: The acaulescent vine crept along the forest floor, embracing its stemless nature.
